message: Cannot combine AUTOINCREMENT and multiple primary keys in SQLite.
details:
[22-May-2025 12:58:47 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS wp_wpusb_report ( id BIGINT(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, post_id BIGINT(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, post_title TEXT NOT NULL, facebook BIGINT(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, twitter BIGINT(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, google BIGINT(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, linkedin BIGINT(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, pinterest BIGINT(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, total BIGINT(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY id ( id ), UNIQUE( post_id ) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4

Queries made or created this session were:

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
  2. Executing: ROLLBACK | (no parameters)
